name: C Math Functions
description: Cheat Sheet for C Math Functions from math.h

Trignometric Functions.val: Returns the sine of x, where x is given in radians. The return value is in the range -1 to 1.
Returns the cosine of x, where x is given in radians. The return value is in the range -1 to 1.
Returns the tangent of x, where x is given in radians.
Returns the sine of x in *sinx and the cosine of x in *cos, where x is given in radians.
Returns the complex sine of z.
Returns the complex cosine of z.
Returns the complex tangent of z.

Inverse Trignometric Functions.val: Returns the arc sine of x in radians. The return value is in the range -pi//2 to pi//2.
Returns the arc cosine of x in radians. The return value is in the range 0 to pi.
Returns the arc tangent of x in radians. The return is in the range -pi//2 to pi//2.
Returns the arc tangent in radians of y/x based on the signs of both values to determine the correct quadrant. The return value is given in radians and is in the range -pi to pi, inclusive.

Exponentiation and Logarithms.val: Returns the value of e raised to the xth power.
Returns the value of 2 raised to the xth power.
Returns the value of 10 raised to the xth power.
Returns the natural logarithm (base-e logarithm) of x.
Returns the natural logarithm (base-2 logarithm) of x.
Returns the common logarithm (base-10 logarithm) of x.
Returns x raised to the power of y.
Returns the square root of x.
Returns the cube root of x.

Hyperbolic Functions.val: Returns the hyperbolic sine of x.
Returns the hyperbolic cosine of x.
Returns the hyperbolic tangent of x.
Returns the complex hyperbolic sine of z.
Returns the complex hyperbolic cosine of z.
Returns the complex hyperbolic tangent of z.
Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine of x.
Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine of x.
Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of x.
Returns the inverse complex hyperbolic sine of z.
Return the inverse complex hyperbolic cosine of z.
Return the inverse complex hyperbolic tangent of z.
